trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were 2 other sightings in Sacramento on or around September 28th 2005
Summary: I saw a bright luminous light
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching out my back window and noticed a light around twilight that looked very bright. This light was brighter than stars and did not twinkle. I saw the same thing yesterday, so I was looking to see if it would happen again tonight, and it did.
